name: Battle of the Mind
description:
Help The Heroine overcome her anxiety and the dragons of Doubt, Panic Attacks, and Intrusive Thoughts.

Control The Heroine as she fights a battle that may not be visible from the outside, but is very real for her.  Restore the light stolen by the darkness of Doubt.  Contain the slumbering Panic Attacks, before the sleeping dragon strikes.  Extinguish the fireballs of the hydra Intrusive Thoughts and release them harmlessly away.

Controls

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space Bar - Interact
